channel.title: ‹‹Acherus by DestriX››
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/56873304/acherus_logo.png[/img][/CENTER]
[I][SIZE=8pt][color=#207cbc]Purpose: [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I] [COLOR=#0260a2] The purpose of this project is to make a great server based on Azure. I picked Azure because of the user-friendliness and it's great implementation of NIO (thanks blakeman8192). I hope to show people the simplicity of Azure and hope that people realize that it can be used as a great server base. This project will most likely be hosted, than released. [/COLOR]
[I][SIZE=8pt][color=#207cbc]Features: [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I] [COLOR=#0260a2]Good Combat Slayer, Prayer, Herblore, Runecrafting Npc Dropping System Consumable Items Redesigned Dialogue System Object Definitions[/COLOR]
[I][SIZE=8pt][color=#207cbc]Media: [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/56873304/Media_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/56873304/Media_2.png[/img]
[I][SIZE=8pt][color=#207cbc]Credit: [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I] [COLOR=#0260a2][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=322577]Tatemo[/URL]/[URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=562810]BorigTheDwarf[/URL] [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=235977]Primadude[/URL] [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=23929]Blakeman8192[/URL] BFMV
[I][SIZE=8pt][color=#207cbc]Special Thanks (according to RuneSource thread): [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I] [COLOR=#0260a2][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=22632]Graham[/URL] [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=28549]Taharok[/URL] [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=1625]wL[/URL] [URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=399]Daiki[/URL] [/COLOR]

item.title: ‹‹Acherus by DestriX››
item.dc:creator: @DestriX_RS DestriX_RS
item.description:
@DestriX_RS wrote:

Updated, added a picture of working Monkey Greegree’s. I will upload a video soon of full ‘Ape-Atoll’.

Project progress will be put on hold from 23 of May to 29 of May. Going to California.

Today’s progression consists of:

- Fixed banking bug.
- Added 'elite' slayer tasks.
- Added more special attacks.

Read full topic

item.title: ‹‹Acherus by DestriX››
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:8, topic:442135”][quote author=_s link=topic=544782.msg3993828#msg3993828 date=1336976354]

I dislike it’s lack of OOP.
[/quote]why

Cuz Java is an oop language? Abstraction and inheritance is very powerful and you aren’t exactly improving yourself when you avoid these because they are too “complicated”.

Edit- Also people say it is so fast. I don’t think you should ever sacrifice architecture for speed.[/quote]abstraction is achievable through many more means than just logic encapsulation and inheritance really is a tradeoff when used extensively; inheritance hierarchies lead to lots of inter-class dependency which makes code reuse a chore due to the lack of modularity. i go by the rule of thumb that inheritance trees should be smaller and independent where classes are only dependent upon a concrete definition and polymorphism & dependency injection do the rest, which is something that Hyperion (for example) does not do well at all. try reusing any class in Hyperion and you’ll end up having to solve all sorts of dependency problems.

you are right to believe that architecture should not be sacrificed for speed, but architecture is a much more complex thing than ‘stick classes together!’

Read full topic

item.title: ‹‹Acherus by DestriX››
item.dc:creator: @DestriX_RS DestriX_RS
item.description:
@DestriX_RS wrote:

Today’s progression consists of:

[code]- Monkey Greegree’s (working on full Ape Atoll).

  • Rebalancing of ‘special content’.
  • More dialogue’s added.
  • Better Ranking System.
  • Start of Aggressive NPC’s.[/code]
Davidi2:

That picture is actually pretty clever, made me chuckle.

Thanks; Media will be updated tomorrow.

I dislike it’s lack of OOP.
[/quote]why[/quote]
Cuz Java is an oop language? Abstraction and inheritance is very powerful and you aren’t exactly improving yourself when you avoid these because they are too “complicated”.

Edit- Also people say it is so fast. I don’t think you should ever sacrifice architecture for speed.
